channel.title: 华尔街日报
channel.description: 这是一个追踪华尔街日报news的种子

item.title: Streetwise 专栏作家 @jmackin2 表示，美国经济中的落后者开始陷入严重的困境，这对那些向他们销售产品的公司的投资者来说是个坏消息。
item.description:
Laggards in the U.S. economy are starting to get in serious trouble, and that’s bad news for investors in companies that sell to them, says Streetwise columnist @jmackin2 https://t.co/Z00xZ6zPZb https://t.co/Z00xZ6zPZb

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 20, 2024

item.title: 乌克兰战争爆发之初，俄罗斯扣押了 400 多架商用喷气式飞机。现在，飞机的所有者和保险公司正在为谁来支付这些飞机的费用而争论不休。
item.description:
Russia seized over 400 commercial jets at the start of the Ukraine war. Now the owners and insurers are battling over who pays for them. https://t.co/0GBCGNDHN5 https://t.co/0GBCGNDHN5

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 20, 2024

item.title: 看：美国空军计划斥资 1300 亿美元更换美国的陆基核导弹。为什么这些导弹对美国的核防御战略如此重要？
item.description:
Watch: The Air Force is planning to spend $130 billion to replace the U.S.’s land-based nuclear missiles. Here’s why these missiles are so important to U.S. nuclear defense strategy. https://t.co/kpmt6ImBaJ https://t.co/kpmt6ImBaJ

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 20, 2024

item.title: 在有线电视倒闭的背景下，ESPN 的老板正在努力重塑这家体育媒体巨头。他能否赢得迪斯尼的最高职位，可能取决于此。
item.description:
ESPN's boss is racing to reinvent the sports-media giant amid the collapse of cable. His chances of winning Disney's top job may depend on it. https://t.co/tyseXqbEy4 https://t.co/tyseXqbEy4

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 20, 2024

item.title: 你是奥斯卡-伊萨克那样的 "默默时尚"，还是 A$AP Rocky 那样的 "男主角"？如何找到自己的标志性风格--为什么它能让穿衣变得如此简单。
item.description:
Are you “silently stylish” like Oscar Isaac or a “leading man” like A$AP Rocky? How to find your signature style—and why it makes getting dressed so easy. https://t.co/mgymvIkwkT https://t.co/mgymvIkwkT

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 20, 2024

item.title: 苹果公司正在寻求外部公司帮助其人工智能工作，并与谷歌和其他人工智能软件提供商就使用他们的技术为其移动功能提供支持进行了讨论。
item.description:
Apple is looking to outside companies to help its artificial intelligence efforts, and has held discussions with Google and other AI software providers about using their technology to power its mobile features https://t.co/xpcu7hedpo https://t.co/xpcu7hedpo

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 20, 2024

item.title: "大规模裁员是领导力的失败"。一家公司是如何避免大规模裁员的，即使在大流行病期间其销售额激增 50%，然后崩溃。
item.description:
“Mass layoffs are a failure of leadership.” How one company has avoided them even when its sales surged 50% during the pandemic then collapsed. https://t.co/r4EmrKSktj https://t.co/r4EmrKSktj

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 20, 2024

item.title: 在销售冰淇淋 100 多年之后，Ben & Jerry's 的所有者联合利华已经失去了对这项业务的兴趣
item.description:
After more than 100 years of selling ice cream, Ben & Jerry’s owner Unilever has lost its taste for the business https://t.co/yKGG0NdD7W https://t.co/yKGG0NdD7W

item.title: 填写 NCAA 签名簿时，有很多方法可以让您赔钱，但只有一种可靠的方法可以让您战胜市场，赢得彩池。不要选其他人都在选的全国冠军。
item.description:
There are many ways to lose money when you fill out your NCAA bracket, but there’s only one reliable method of beating the market and winning your pool. Don’t pick the national champion that everyone else is picking. https://t.co/gjUrenlu67 https://t.co/gjUrenlu67

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 20, 2024

item.title: 观看：新加坡这个小岛国的军费开支超过东南亚任何其他国家。以下是它在国防上花费数十亿美元的原因。
item.description:
Watch: The tiny island state of Singapore spends more on its military than any other country in Southeast Asia. Here’s why it spends billions of dollars on defense. https://t.co/YvdjPc2sDg https://t.co/YvdjPc2sDg

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 20, 2024

item.title: 上周末，凯特-米德尔顿（Kate Middleton）被拍到与丈夫威廉王子在一起。但网上的侦探们仍在猜测是否有替身。
item.description:

item.title: 台湾国防部长暗示美军一直在离岛训练台湾军队，而这些离岛将处于与邻国冲突的前线
item.description:
Taiwan’s defense minister has hinted that U.S. troops have been training the Taiwanese military on outlying islands that would be on the front lines of a conflict with its neighbor https://t.co/MOJ9D10vY0 https://t.co/MOJ9D10vY0

item.title: 卡莉-加迪（Kali Gaddie）还是一名大四学生时，大流行病突然打乱了她的人生计划，并使她加入了一股庞大而极不快乐的政治力量，这股力量将在 2024 年的选举季中发挥巨大作用。
item.description:
Kali Gaddie was a college senior when the pandemic abruptly upended her life plans—and made her part of a big and deeply unhappy political force that figures to play a huge role in the 2024 election season https://t.co/S51LInTaU9 https://t.co/S51LInTaU9

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 20, 2024

item.title: "又低又长的设计与生俱来就具有亲和力"，给卧室带来 "宁静的自信"。为什么跨越墙壁的床头板--设计师从豪华酒店中偷师的技巧--正在流行起来。
item.description:
“The low and long design is inherently intimate" and gives a bedroom "quiet confidence." Why wall-spanning headboards—a trick designers stole from luxury hotels—are catching on. https://t.co/LRz8MepmVc https://t.co/LRz8MepmVc

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 20, 2024

item.title: 袋子放在传送带上还是垃圾桶里？笔记本电脑在包里还是包外？机场安检为何如此令人困惑？

item.title: 🎧 听：在今天的《日报》播客中，@AAndriotis 解释了为什么高盛的许多女性高管要离开这家华尔街巨头。

item.title: 来自@WSJopinion：拜登政府威慑对手的能力不断下降，这是美国外交政策、世界和平以及拜登连任的最大问题，@wrmead 写道。
item.description:
From @WSJopinion: The Biden administration’s declining power to deter our adversaries is the biggest problem for American foreign policy, for world peace and, potentially, for his re-election, writes @wrmead https://t.co/wbM2Dig5wS https://t.co/wbM2Dig5wS

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 20, 2024

item.title: 特朗普支持的伯尼-莫雷诺赢得了俄亥俄州竞争激烈的参议院共和党初选，这是前总统掌控该党的又一迹象
item.description:
Trump-backed Bernie Moreno won Ohio’s competitive Senate GOP primary, another sign of the former president’s grip on the party https://t.co/vTFT8CPezw https://t.co/vTFT8CPezw

item.title: 从电动汽车、自行车和滑板车到手机和 Vape 笔，消防部门正在努力应对涉及锂离子电池的快速燃烧和往往致命的火灾。
item.description:
Fire departments are grappling with rapidly burning and often deadly blazes involving lithium-ion batteries in everything from electric cars, bikes and scooters to cellphones and vape pens https://t.co/f4qTPBZXSQ https://t.co/f4qTPBZXSQ

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 20, 2024

item.title: 由于止痛药和抗生素供应不足，加沙的医生们正在努力治疗数以千计失去四肢的巴勒斯坦人。

Running low on painkillers and antibiotics, doctors are Gaza are struggling to treat thousands of Palestinians who have lost limbs https://t.co/rtC90glOLf https://t.co/rtC90glOLf

item.title: 30 岁及以下人群是美国最不幸福的年龄组，其幸福感下降的原因是他们对自己的生活感觉更糟糕了
item.description:
Those 30 and under are the U.S.’s least happy age group, a decline attributed to their feeling worse about their lives https://t.co/tJGFb317Z5 https://t.co/tJGFb317Z5

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 20, 2024

item.title: 来自@WSJopinion：各机构必须承认，Covid 封锁、学校关闭和强制措施都是错误，不会再犯。斯科特-W-阿特拉斯（Scott W. Atlas）和 @史蒂夫-汉克（steve_hanke）写道，在他们承认错误之前，美国人民应该继续保持对他们的信任。
item.description:
From @WSJopinion: Institutions must acknowledge that Covid lockdowns, school closings and mandates were errors that won’t be repeated. Until they do, the American people should continue to withhold their trust, write Scott W. Atlas and @steve_hanke. https://t.co/OHKdWByF9a

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 20, 2024

item.title: 捷蓝航空将退出某些城市并终止部分航线，以便在飞机数量有限的情况下，优先选择业绩更好的航线
item.description:
JetBlue is exiting certain cities and ending some flight routes in a bid to prioritize better-performing routes with limited aircraft on hand https://t.co/GuuMYYL6OF https://t.co/GuuMYYL6OF

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 19, 2024
